items.title: Get a Creality 3D printer at an all-time low pricing until Christmas â€” up to $300 off K2 series with CFS bundle
items.summary: Get your hands on one of Creality's K2 combo deals across the K2 lineup this Christmas season; the K2, K2 Pro, and K2 Plus combos are all on sale for up to $300 off.

items.title: Saracens fall to Champions Cup defeat by Sharks
items.summary: Saracens' ill-discipline proves costly as they fall to a 28-23 Investec Champions Cup defeat by the Sharks in torrential rain in Durban.

items.title: England beat Jamaica in first day of Netball Horizon Series
items.summary: England beat Jamaica 80-37 in the first day of the Vitality Netball Horizon Series. The second game can be watched on Sunday, 14 December, 14:00-15:45 GMT on iPlayer and BBC Sport website.

items.title: Sale claim superb bonus-point win against Clermont
items.summary: Sale Sharks clinch an impressive bonus-point win against Clermont Auvergne to boost their hopes of qualifying from Pool One of the Champions Cup.

items.title: 'Fantastic human' Russo shines in Arsenal win at Everton
items.summary: England striker Alessia Russo was at the heart of Arsenal's WSL win at Everton - a reminder to doubters of how indispensable she is.

items.title: Anderson avoids shock to reach World Championship second round
items.summary: Gary Anderson books his place in the second round of the PDC World Championship with a hard-fought 3-2 win over Adam Hunt.

items.title: Slab is the first MIDI controller built exclusively for Serato Studio
items.summary: Music making is always better with hardware. Native Instruments and Ableton have had incredible success with their custom MIDI controllers that integrate with their DAWs (digital audio workstations), Maschine and Live, respectively. Native Instruments' Maschine (yes, it's the name of the hardware aâ€¦

Azerbaijanâ€™s 2026 Oscar entry, about philanthropist, oil magnate and â€œfather of the nationâ€ Zeynalabdin Taghiyev, is resplendent in its conception asâ€¦

items.title: Dell preps massive price hikes up to 30% citing memory pricing 'out of our control' â€” company reminds commercial customers that placing an order today for future delivery will not guarantee current prices
items.summary: Dell's commercial sales department is set to announce a wave of price hikes affecting RAM, storage, GPU, and monitor upgrades to all corporate clients starting on December 17, according to leaked internal documents.

items.title: OnePlus 15 gets Neon camera filter and bypass charging support for non-gaming activities with the latest update
items.summary: OnePlus has released the OxygenOS 16.0.2.401 update for the OnePlus 15. It comes with the December 2025 Android security patch and adds a "Neon" filter to the default Camera app, recreating the CineStill 800T film effect. With the new update, the filter in the Photos app now supports "Motion Photo,â€¦

items.title: England dominate Jamaica in series opener
items.summary: England beat Jamaica 80-37 in the opening game of their two-match international series.

items.title: New app injects AMD's AI-driven FSR Redstone framegen into unsupported games â€” pre-alpha OptiScaler build demo shows nice improvements over legacy FSR frame gen
items.summary: A Reddit user has demonstrated AMDâ€™s new ML-powered FSR Redstone frame generation running in Monster Hunter Wilds, a game that was never designed to support it.

The tech promises to enable a 2.5D integration on organic substrates to support up to 64 GB per stack and more stacksâ€¦

items.title: Abraham Quintanilla, Father and Manager of Music Icon Selena, Dies at 86
items.summary: Abraham Quintanilla Jr., the patriarch who helped shape the career of his daughter, Tejano superstar Selena, and remained the steward of her legacy for three decades after her death, has died. He was 86. The news was announced Saturday morning by his son, A.B. Quintanilla III, who shared a photo ofâ€¦

items.title: South Africa beat Ireland in opening ODI encounter
items.summary: South Africa overcome Ireland by seven wickets in the first one-day international of a three-game series.

items.title: Sektori is psychedelic, tough as nails, and worth the pain
items.summary: Sektori is an old-school twin-stick shooter. Created by a former developer at Returnal studio Housemarque, it puts you in the role of a little ship that blasts through swarms of enemies, and you have to weave through them to get upgrades to help you survive. Often, my runs end after less than a couâ€¦

items.summary: Amazon Prime members may be eligible for free same-day delivery. | Photo: Justin Sullivan / Getty Images Letâ€™s face it, the same thing happens year after year.
